dtliExcerpt: Jude Law brings a brooding intensity to the Danish prince, though his interpretation sometimes feels more calculated than spontaneous. The production, directed by Michael Grandage, offers handsome staging but doesn't always illuminate Shakespeare's text in fresh ways.
